title: Ritchie Bros., world's largest heavy-construction equipment auction firm, prepares for big selloff
text:
Published By: Denver Post Local - Today 
The 85-acre auction yard looks like a giant toy box, with clusters of crawler tractors, motor graders, articulated dump trucks and even a 20...
